After several years of waiting Serbian investigative organs have had the opportunity to interview, in Germany, Dragan Antic, formerly Tesic. Source: B92 Friday, 26.02.2016. 16:12  Rat u Ukrajini – 1.462. dan. Navršile su se pune četiri godine od početka rata u Ukrajini.
